titles: A curious treatise of the nature and quality of chocolate. VVritten in Spanish by Antonio Colmenero, doctor in physicke and chirurgery. And put into English by Don Diego de Vades-forte

author: Colmenero de Ledesma, Antonio.
Wadsworth, James, 1604-1656?
publisher: By I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholomewes,
notes: Don Diego de Vades-forte = James Wadsworth.
